prauda ithihasayaka urumaya mathin jayagrahi warthamanayak osse saubhagayamath anagathayak kara rata, daya meheyawana abhitha jananayaka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathindunge jaya handa, mathru bhumiya aaraksha karana ranawiruwange edithara wikuman kiya pa rana handa, hela kala kethin nanga aa aanandaniya rangum handa olagankanda ha nawgala kandu mundun sisara nimnada demin 66 wani jathika nidahas ulela kagalla nagarayedi eeye (04) mahath uthsawakarayen pawathwina.pura siyawasakatath adhika kalayak adhirajyawadi wahal bammen bandi thibu lanka mathawa nidahasa laba wasara 66k pirunath ema nidahasa wadath arthanwitha kala abhitha janatha nayaka janadhipathi mahinda rajaksha mahathage saha janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mahathmiyage sambhawaniya sahabhagithwayen kagalla abhinawa nidahas mawathe di nidahas ulela pawathwina.batahira adhirajyawadingen, koti thrasthawadingen dahasakuth gahata windi lakmathawa me wana wita ee anduru sapayen me wana wita midi thibe.

sangithayata sawan dima, awidima yana krama dekata wada miniththu hayaka kalayak pothak kiyawimen itha ikmanin manasika pidanaya duru kara gatha haki bawath mehidi soya gena atha.saseks wishwawidyalaye widyagnyayin penwa dena paridi; pothak kiyawimedi yodana manasika awadhanaya mangin manshapeshiwala aathathiya ha hruda spandhanaye wegaya adu weyi.itha aashawen pothak kiyawime di thanikama ha manasika gataluwalin mohothakata nidahaswima siduwana athara eya rupawahiniya narambaimatath pariganaka krida yedimatath wada itha wadi wara gananakin manasata suwaya gena dena bawa da me soya ganimwala adangu ya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
